input: Which one of the following statements is not correct regarding Certiorari?

options.A: A High Court can issue a writ against itself in its administrative capacity
options.B: A bench of a High Court can issue a writ to another bench of the same High Court
options.C: A High Court cannot issue a writ to another High Court
options.D: A High Court can issue certiorari to a tribunal situated within its jurisdiction

explanation: A bench of a High court is equal to the High court in all judicial powers. Hence a bench of the High court cannot issue certiorari against the order of another bench.
